entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3 except plus 2 near Chetwynd.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 3 except plus 2 near Chetwynd. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
